entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Sept-Îles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sept-Îles Airport 2:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 32 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: E 29 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Snow at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
